name: 12South Mktg
tagline: Digital Marketing for Entertainment and eCommerce
description: Digital Marketing for Entertainment and eCommerce Brands. We’re experts at building long-term inbound marketing strategies for niche brands using a savvy blend of custom content, web development, market analysis, and advertising. Working with us means having an entire team of marketing strategists, designers, developers and data analysts at your disposal. Whatever you’re trying to accomplish online, we have the makeup to hit every touchpoint, from discovery to conception and execution.
